name: Bright Minds Therapy
shortDescription: Helping children with dyslexia thrive academically.
longDescription: Bright Minds Therapy offers structured reading programs and one-on-one support tailored for children with dyslexia.

name: Focus Forward Coaching
longDescription: Our ADHD coaches work closely with students to improve focus, time management, and academic performance.

name: Learning Ladder
longDescription: Learning Ladder specializes in behavior therapy and inclusive education strategies for children with autism.

name: Step Ahead Tutors
shortDescription: Tutoring for children with diverse learning needs.
longDescription: Step Ahead provides tutoring customized to each child's learning profile, including dyscalculia, dysgraphia, and more.

name: Calm Minds
longDescription: Calm Minds helps children manage emotions and behaviors through CBT and play-based therapy.

name: Pathways Center
shortDescription: Speech and language development for early learners.
longDescription: Pathways offers specialized therapy for speech delays and language difficulties using interactive, age-appropriate techniques.

name: NeuroBridge
shortDescription: Enhancing memory, focus, and problem-solving in kids.
longDescription: NeuroBridge combines neuroscience-based activities and technology to strengthen children's cognitive abilities.
